## EditorApi.setReadOnlyCursor() method

Set whether to show the cursor when the editor readOnly is true

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setReadOnlyCursor(readOnlyCursor: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type |
|  --- | --- |
|  readOnlyCursor | boolean |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
